overview.title: Overview
overview.body: The Referral Bonus rewards affiliates based on the wager turnover from referred players in Slots , Live Casino , Sportsbooks and Lottery. Commissions are calculated every 24 hours, with earnings based on different turnover tiers.

calculation.title: How Commissions Are Calculated
calculation.desc:
Commissions are calculated every 24 hours based on referred players' total wagers. 
Examples:

points.0: Commissions are available for withdrawal once calculated.
points.1: There is no expiration for unclaimed commissions‚Äîthey accumulate until claimed.
points.2: Withdrawals follow the platform's standard rules, such as minimum limits and processing times.

system.title: System Time and Operations

system.note: Note: While we work with providers from different time zones, all calculations follow UTC to ensure consistency and avoid confusion.

responseTime.title: Expected Response Times
responseTime.description: We strive to respond to all inquiries as quickly as possible.

items.question: How do I reset my password?
items.answer: You can reset your password by clicking the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page. Enter your registered email address and follow the instructions sent to your inbox.

items.question: How long do withdrawals take to process?
items.answer: Most cryptocurrency withdrawals are processed instantly. In some cases, manual verification may be required, which can take up to 24 hours.

items.question: What cryptocurrencies do you accept?
items.answer: We accept major cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), USDT, USDC, and several other popular tokens across multiple blockchain networks.

items.question: How can I verify my account?
items.answer: Account verification can be completed through your profile settings. You may need to provide identification documents depending on your account tier and withdrawal limits.

items.question: Is my personal information secure?
items.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect all personal and financial information. Our platform undergoes regular security audits.

about.title: About {siteDomain}
about.subtitle: At {siteName}, gaming isn't just about fun ‚Äî it's a whole new way to play.

meta.title: About {siteName} | Crypto-Powered Gaming Platform
meta.description: Learn about {siteName} ‚Äî a decentralized crypto casino offering provably fair slots, live casino, sports betting, and instant payouts. Built for today's blockchain era.

intro.paragraph1: At {siteName}, gaming isn't just about fun ‚Äî it's a whole new way to play. We built this crypto powered platform for people who want more than just luck. If you care about speed, transparency, and having control, you're in the right place.
intro.paragraph2: From day one, our goal was clear: give players a next-level gaming experience where tech and fairness actually work together. We want you to feel safe, connected, and like you're getting rewarded for every spin, bet, or hand. Whether you're spinning crypto slots, betting live on sports, or sitting at a casino table, {siteName} is built for today's blockchain era.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.paragraph1: We're a worldwide, fully decentralized gaming platform designed for crypto fans who want freedom, privacy, and instant action. We work with top names in the industry‚ÄîPragmatic Play, Red Tiger, Yggdrasil, PG Soft, Playtech and bring you over 5,000 premium games and betting options, all in one place.
whoWeAre.paragraph2: Every game on {siteName} is provably fair and blockchain-verified. No shady stuff, just total transparency. We believe gaming should be trustless but still human, mixing the honesty of blockchain with a smooth, exciting experience that anyone can enjoy, wherever they are.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: We want to change how people experience online gaming‚Äîmake it faster, fairer, and fully crypto-driven. So we ditched the usual hassles like KYC checks, slow payouts, and trust issues. Here, you get wallet-based access, instant transactions, and proof of fairness on every single bet.
mission.paragraph2: Your privacy stays protected, your winnings are paid out instantly, and you're always in control of your play.

focus.title: What We Focus On
items: Lightning-fast deposits and withdrawals
Privacy-first access with no KYC
A seamless UI that works everywhere
Real, 24/7 customer support from actual humans
focus.closing: Trust matters to us. Every new feature? It's designed for you.

whatMakesUsDifferent.title: What Sets {siteName} Apart
features: Over 5,000 crypto casino games‚Äîslots, poker, live tables, you name it
Wallet-based login with Dynamic.xyz‚Äîjust connect and play, no waiting
Instant crypto payouts‚Äîautomated and verified right on the blockchain
Every game is provably fair and RNG-certified
Works perfectly on any device, mobile or desktop
Transparent rewards‚Äîbonuses and promos that actually benefit players
whatMakesUsDifferent.closing: {siteName} isn't just about games‚Äîit's about freedom. Play securely, from anywhere, with total transparency.

fairGaming.title: Fair & Responsible Gaming
fairGaming.paragraph1: We also take fair and responsible gaming seriously. We don't let anyone under 18 (or under their country's legal age) play, period. Every game gets checked by independent testers and runs on blockchain transparency, so you can verify every outcome yourself.
fairGaming.ageRestriction: Only players aged 18 or older can register and play.
fairGaming.paragraph2: Your personal and financial info stays private‚Äîalways. We use end-to-end encryption and never store your wallet keys or sensitive data.

promise.title: Our Promise
promise.paragraph1: We're not just another online casino. We're the next step in gaming. {siteName} exists to empower players, not control them. With crypto tech, provable fairness, and a player-first approach, we're building a gaming world that's open, safe, and rewarding.
promise.paragraph2: Every update, feature, or new partner‚Äîeverything we do is about making gaming fair, instant, and yours.

joinCommunity.title: Ready to Join?
joinCommunity.paragraph1: The future of gaming is here‚Äîdecentralized, lightning-fast, and without borders. Sign up, connect your wallet, and see what real gaming freedom feels like.

seoContent.title: {siteName} ‚Äî Your Ultimate Destination for Crypto Casino Entertainment
seoContent.paragraph1: Step into the future of online gaming with {siteName}, the world's premier crypto-powered casino where innovation meets excitement. Designed for real players, our platform delivers a fast, secure, and transparent experience across slots, live casino tables, sports betting, and crypto games.
seoContent.paragraph2: Every spin, card, and wager at {siteName} is built on blockchain fairness, verified in real time to ensure every outcome is truly random and tamper-proof. From high-stakes action to casual play, our games cater to every kind of gambler ‚Äî from the thrill-seekers to the strategy pros.
seoContent.paragraph3: With instant deposits and lightning-fast withdrawals, Dynamic.xyz wallet login, and exclusive turnover bonuses, {siteName} makes sure your gaming stays smooth, rewarding, and secure.|Whether you're in Canada, Europe, or Asia, our multi-chain system supports global players while optimizing for local crypto casino trends in every region.
seoContent.paragraph4: Join thousands of players discovering a smarter way to play ‚Äî where fair play, privacy, and profit come together.|{siteName} isn't just a casino.|It's the next evolution of Web3 gambling ‚Äî built for the bold, powered by crypto, and trusted by players worldwide.
seoContent.tagline: üéØ Play Smart. Bet Secure. Win Big ‚Äî Only at {siteName}.

disclaimer.line2: Gambling can be addictive. Please play responsibly and only bet what you can afford to lose.
disclaimer.line3: If you feel you have a gambling problem, please seek help.

footer.description: {siteName} ‚Äî your trusted crypto casino for slots, live tables, and sports betting.|Play provably fair blockchain games, enjoy instant wallet-based payouts, and unlock daily casino bonuses.|Fast, secure, and decentralized ‚Äî {siteName} brings next-level gaming to players worldwide.|üéØ Play Smart. Win Big. Trust {siteName}.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy ‚Äî {siteDomain}
privacy.subtitle: How we handle your info covering your crypto wallet, gameplay, and anything you do on our site

intro.paragraph1: At {siteName} ('{siteDomain},' 'we,' 'us,' or 'our'), your privacy is front and center. We run the {siteName} crypto casino and decentralized gaming platform, and this Privacy Policy lays out how we handle your info covering your crypto wallet, gameplay, and anything you do on our site, dApp, or related services (we'll call these the 'Services').
intro.paragraph2: {siteDomain} is a wallet-only crypto casino. That means deposits and withdrawals go straight through the blockchain, no middleman. We don't ask for your ID, and we never store personal identity info. Your privacy, wallet, and assets? They stay yours.
intro.paragraph3: By using {siteDomain}, you're agreeing to this Privacy Policy.

scope.title: Scope & Acceptance
scope.content: This policy covers everyone who visits or uses {siteDomain}. If we ever need to update the policy‚Äîmaybe because of new tech or changing laws we'll post the changes right here. If you keep using the platform after that, you're accepting the new terms.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We built {siteName} with privacy in mind. We only ask for what's needed to make the site work, keep things secure, and make sure the games are fair.

accountData.title: A. Wallet & Account Data

items.0: Connected wallet address (through Dynamic.xyz, WalletConnect, or MetaMask).
items.1: Display name (optional) if you want to personalize your account.
items.2: Email address (optional) if you sign up for newsletters or reach out to support.

accountData.kyc: We never do identity checks or collect government IDs. If, and only if, a legal situation pops up (like a fraud investigation), we might ask for proof of identity. If that happens, we'll be upfront about it and only ask for what's strictly necessary.

walletData.title: B. Transaction Data
walletData.addresses: Blockchain wallet addresses used for deposits or withdrawals.
walletData.transactions: Transaction hashes, timestamps, and network confirmations.
walletData.metadata: Deposit and withdrawal details for balancing your account.
walletData.note: All crypto transactions are public on the blockchain. We don't edit, hide, or try to make this data anonymous‚Äîeverything's transparent.

technicalData.title: C. Technical & Usage Data
technicalData.ip: Info about your device and browser (type, OS, screen size).|IP address and rough location for fraud prevention.
technicalData.session: Pages you visit, games you play, transaction history, and time spent on site.
technicalData.cookies: Cookies and analytics to help us improve the experience.

securityData.title: D. Security & Risk Data
securityData.disputes: Gameplay session logs for fairness and to help resolve issues.|Automated checks to spot bots or abuse.
securityData.note: We don't collect sensitive personal data like your ethnicity, religion, political views, or biometrics.

purposes.title: Why We Collect Data
purposes.intro: Here's what we use your info for:
purposes.outro: You can unsubscribe from marketing messages whenever you want.

0.title: Service Operations
0.description: To let you log in with your wallet, verify transactions, run games, and handle payouts.

1.title: Security & Fraud Prevention
1.description: To spot and prevent fraud, duplicate accounts, or anything fishy.

2.title: Platform Improvement
2.description: To make the site run better and smoother.

3.title: Marketing (with consent)
3.description: For marketing, but only if you say yes‚Äîwe never sneak in promos without your permission.

4.title: Platform Integrity
4.description: To protect {siteName} and keep gaming fair.

cryptoWallet.title: Blockchain Transparency
cryptoWallet.outro: If you use a third-party wallet (like Dynamic.xyz, WalletConnect, or MetaMask), their privacy policy applies to your use of their service

points.0: Your wallet and transaction data live permanently on public blockchains like Ethereum or BNB Chain.
points.1: Once a blockchain transaction's done, we can't change or erase it.
points.2: We only store the bare minimum of info off-chain, just for technical and account reasons.
points.3: If you use a third-party wallet (like Dynamic.xyz, WalletConnect, or MetaMask), their privacy policy applies to your use of their service.

dataSharing.title: Sharing & Disclosure
dataSharing.intro: We don't sell, trade, or rent your data. Ever.
dataSharing.para: But in rare cases, we might have to share limited info:

items.0: If the law or a valid legal process demands it.
items.1: With anti-fraud partners or blockchain analytics tools if we spot suspicious activity.
items.2: If there's a merger, acquisition, or major business change always under strict confidentiality.

dataSharing.noSelling: Whenever we share anything, we make sure it follows data protection laws.

security.title: Security Measures
security.intro: We take your security seriously and layer several advanced protections to keep your data and digital assets safe:

items.0: Every bit of data you send between your browser and our servers gets TLS/SSL encryption.
items.1: We store logs and technical data in encrypted form.
items.2: Role-based access control (RBAC) keeps internal access tightly locked down.
items.3: We run regular penetration tests and bring in outside experts for security audits.
items.4: Admins log in with Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) for extra safety.

security.warning:
Just a heads up:

üîê {siteName} will never ask for your private keys or seed phrases. Keep your wallet credentials private that's on you.

cookies.title: Cookies & Analytics
cookies.intro: We use cookies and tracking tools to:

items.0: Keep your wallet connected and sessions stable.
items.2: Gather anonymous analytics so we can understand how people use the site.

cookies.outro: You can turn off non-essential cookies in your browser whenever you want. If you block essential cookies, though, you might run into issues with gameplay or wallet connections.

minAge.title: Underage Use Policy
minAge.intro: {siteDomain} is off-limits to anyone under 18, or under the legal gambling age in their area.
minAge.content:
If we find out someone is underage, we'll suspend the account right away, void any winnings, and wipe related data. 
For parents and guardians:

items.1: Don't save wallet info on shared devices.
items.2: Set up tools like NetNanny or GamBlock to block gambling sites.

breach.title: Data Breach Response
breach.content: If a data breach ever threatens your rights or security:

items.0: We'll alert all affected users right away.
items.1: We'll notify the right authorities, following the law.
items.2: We'll act fast to fix problems and restore security.

changes.title: Policy Updates
changes.content: We update this Privacy Policy from time to time as things change whether it's operations, technology, or the law. Big changes will show up on the site as notifications or banners. Check this page now and then to stay in the loop.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: Got questions, privacy concerns, or a request about your data? Reach out any time:

ownership.title: Who Runs {siteDomain}
ownership.content1: {siteDomain} belongs to {siteName} N.V. That's us‚Äîwhen we say '{siteName},' 'we,' 'our,' or 'us,' we're talking about the team behind the site.
ownership.content2: We run a wallet-only crypto casino. All deposits, bets, and withdrawals move straight through your own crypto wallet. For security and easy access, we support Dynamic.xyz, WalletConnect, and MetaMask.

notice.title: What You're Agreeing To
notice.content: When you connect your wallet or use {siteDomain}, you're agreeing to:

items.3: Any bonus, affiliate, or promo terms
items.4: All other rules or updates posted on {siteDomain}

notice.content2: If you don't accept these terms, just don't use {siteDomain}.
notice.outro: It's up to you to make sure crypto gaming is allowed where you live before you play.

general.title: The Basics
items: Once you connect your wallet, you agree to follow every rule and guideline here.
These terms are a binding agreement between you and {siteDomain}. They kick in as soon as you connect your wallet or use the site.
We can update these terms whenever we need to. If we do, we'll post the new version here and it applies right away.
If there's a conflict between these terms and anything else bonus offers, third-party stuff, you name it‚Äîthese terms win.
The English version is the official one. Translations are just to help out.

walletLogin.title: Wallet Connection & Ownership
items: We use Dynamic.xyz and other wallet connectors for login and authentication. When you connect your wallet, you confirm you own it and let us link it to your account.

We will never ask for your private keys, seed phrases, or recovery info. Your wallet's security is in your hands. We're not responsible if you get phished, hacked, or lose access because of your own device.

registration.title: Email & Account Details
items: You can give us an email or username if you want help or updates, but that's optional.
You're responsible for everything that happens with your connected wallet.

security.title: Multiple Accounts & Security
items: Stick with one wallet/account per person. If you try to game the system using more than one, we can suspend your account and keep your funds.
If your wallet supports 2FA, turn it on.
If something seems off, email us at support@digidice.games right away.

eligibility.title: Who Can Play and What You Promise
items: You're at least 18, or whatever the legal gambling age is where you live.
Online crypto gaming is legal for you.
You own the wallet you connect.
You won't use VPNs, proxies, or IP-masking to dodge geo-blocks.
You won't use {siteName} for anything illegal or shady.
You get that crypto is volatile, and you accept the risks.
eligibility.outro: If you break any of these promises, we can suspend or close your account, and hold your funds if the law says so.

restricted.title: Where You Can't Play
restricted.content1: {siteDomain} is off-limits if you're in a place where online gambling or crypto betting is restricted. That means, for example: United States, United Kingdom, France, Netherlands, Spain, Germany, Australia, Comoros, Iran, North Korea, Syria, Sudan, and anywhere on the FATF blacklist.
restricted.content2: Trying to sneak in with a VPN or proxy? Don't. If you do, we'll close your account and you'll lose your funds.

policy.title: Crypto-Only
items: We're crypto-only. You can deposit and withdraw with approved coins only: BTC, ETH, USDT, BNB, TRX, and similar. No fiat or card payments.
All transactions have to come from wallets you control. No third-party or shared wallets.

deposits.title: Deposits
items: When you deposit, your funds show up after the blockchain confirms the transaction. You cover the network (gas) fees, not us. The minimum deposit is $10 in crypto. We might reject deposits from blacklisted or risky wallets.

withdrawals.title: Withdrawals
items: Withdrawals go straight to your chosen wallet. Make sure it works with the right blockchain. Minimum withdrawal is usually $10, depending on fees. We might delay withdrawals for fraud checks or security.
All blockchain transactions are final. We can't cancel, refund, or change them once they're confirmed.

kyc.title: NO KYC POLICY
kyc.intro: {siteDomain} runs on a No KYC model, so you can play without ID checks for regular games.
kyc.content1: But sometimes, {siteName} might ask for a bit of info if:
items: The law or an authority requires it.
They need to look into fraud or suspicious behavior.
It's needed to keep the platform secure or meet regulations.
kyc.outro: If you don't cooperate with a legal verification request, your account might get suspended or your withdrawals could be delayed.

fairPlay.title: FAIR PLAY, CONDUCT & SECURITY
items: Use bots, scripts, or auto-play tools.
Team up with others to fix results.
Take advantage of bugs or smart contract loopholes.
Abuse bonuses, referrals, or promos.
fairPlay.outro1: If you break these rules, {siteName} can ban your account for good and take your balance.
fairPlay.outro2: {siteName} uses AI fraud detection, behavioral analytics, and blockchain checks to keep things fair and secure.

bonuses.title: BONUSES & PROMOTIONS
items: Each bonus follows its own set of terms listed with the promo.
If you abuse bonuses (like making extra accounts, cycling wallets, or using VPNs), you lose your bonus.
You have to meet all wagering requirements before you can cash out bonus winnings.

playingRules.title: GAME RULES & RESULTS
items: Your bet counts only after you see confirmation on the screen. If your balance can't cover it, the bet's void.
If there's a dispute, {siteName}'s blockchain records are final.
All provably fair games use on-chain randomness to stay transparent.

errors.title: LIMITATIONS & INTERRUPTIONS
items: Internet drops or lag.
Blockchain delays or forks.
Wallet downtime from third parties.
Smart contract or game provider glitches.
errors.outro1: {siteName} can void bets or transactions if a tech issue or exploit messes things up.

suspension.title: ACCOUNT SUSPENSION & FUNDS
suspension.intro: {siteName} can suspend or shut down accounts for:
items: Breaking the rules
Fraud
Legal reasons.
suspension.outro1: Any money left will be handled according to the law and {siteName}'s policies.

responsibleGaming.title: RESPONSIBLE GAMING
items: {siteName} supports responsible gambling. If you need a break, email support@digidice.games for self-exclusion or a cool-off.
No one under 18 or below the legal age can play. Accounts found breaking this rule get shut down immediately.

ip.title: INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
ip.content1: All trademarks, graphics, content, and software belong to {siteName} or its licensors. You can use them only for personal fun. Don't copy or share them without permission.

liability.title: LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
items: {siteName} isn't responsible for indirect or unexpected damages‚Äîlike lost profits.
If there's a claim, the most {siteName} will cover is your latest deposit.

disputes.title: DISPUTE RESOLUTION
disputes.content: If you've got a complaint or dispute, reach out to {siteDomain}. They aim to sort things out quickly and fairly.

amendments.title: AMENDMENTS
amendments.content: {siteName} can change these Terms anytime. The latest version is always at https://{siteDomain}. By using the site, you accept any updates.

miscellaneous.title: MISCELLANEOUS
items: These Terms are the whole agreement between you and {siteName}. If any part doesn't hold up, the rest still stands. {siteName} can assign or delegate its rights, but users can't.

responsibleGambling.title: Responsible Gambling at {siteName}
responsibleGambling.subtitle: Learn about responsible gambling at {siteName}. Stay in control, play responsibly, and get support through global help organizations.

intro.title: Responsible Gambling at {siteName}
intro.paragraph1: At {siteName}, we want gaming to be exciting, fair, and always responsible. Our main goal? Make sure every player has a great time‚Äîwhile staying informed, safe, and in control.
intro.paragraph2: We don't allow anyone under 18 (or below the legal age in their country) to play. Period.

mission.title: Our mission is simple:
mission.paragraph1: Responsible gaming isn't just a rule for us‚Äîit's at the heart of what we do. We're committed to building a transparent, secure, crypto-powered space where you can make smart, balanced choices.

beliefs.0: Gambling as entertainment, not a way to make money
beliefs.2: Tools, education, and access to real help organizations worldwide

understanding.title: Responsible Gambling: What It Really Means
understanding.paragraph1: Crypto gaming is quick, borderless, and right at your fingertips. That's exciting, but it also means you need to stay alert. Responsible gambling isn't just a buzzword ‚Äî it's about knowing your limits, keeping an eye on your time and crypto, and making sure gaming stays enjoyable, not something you can't walk away from.
understanding.paragraph2: Here's how to keep things safe and fun:

tips.0: Play for the thrill, not for making money.
tips.1: Don't chase your losses. If you're frustrated, step away for a bit.
tips.2: Set your own limits on how long you play and how much you deposit.
tips.3: If you're tired, stressed, or upset, take a break instead of playing.
tips.4: Never gamble money you need for rent, food, or anything essential.
tips.5: When the fun's gone, hit pause and reset.

selfCheck.title: Quick Self-Check: Are You Still in Control?

questions.0: Do you end up playing longer than you meant to?
questions.1: Is gaming taking a toll on your job or relationships?
questions.2: Do you get restless or annoyed when you can't play?
questions.3: Are you gambling just to escape stress or boredom?
questions.4: Have you borrowed crypto just to keep playing?
questions.5: Do you raise your bets after losing, hoping to win it all back?

selfCheck.warning: If you said "yes" to a few of these, it's probably time to step back or talk to someone about it.

tools.title: How {siteName} Looks Out for You
tools.intro: We want you to have fun, but we care even more about your well-being. That's why {siteName} gives you tools to play it safe and stay aware of your spending.

selfExclusion.title: Self-Exclusion
selfExclusion.description: You can ask to block your account temporarily or for good. During that time, you won't be able to play or get our promos. Just email support@{siteDomain} ‚Äî everything stays private.

coolingOff.title: Cooling-Off Periods
coolingOff.paragraph1: Need a breather? Pick a pause that works for you:
coolingOff.paragraph2: While you're on pause, your wallet won't work for gaming.

depositAwareness.title: Crypto Deposit Awareness
depositAwareness.description: {siteName} runs fully on the blockchain. We suggest you keep an eye on your wallet or a block explorer to track your deposits and bets.

underagePrevention.title: Keeping Minors Out
underagePrevention.paragraph1: We don't allow anyone under 18 to play, deposit, or register. Period.

tips.0: Set passwords and use parental controls.
tips.1: Don't save wallet info on shared devices.
tips.2: Log out of {siteName} when you're not around.
tips.3: Install web filters like NetNanny or GamBlock to block access.
tips.4: Regularly check what your kids do online.

underagePrevention.warning: If we spot underage play, we shut that account down and forfeit any winnings.

helpSupport.title: Need Help? You're Not Alone
helpSupport.intro: If gambling starts to take over, there's real help out there ‚Äî free, private, and judgment-free.|Check out these global organizations for support:
helpSupport.paragraph2: They offer self-tests, online chats, and support from people who get it.

0.title: Transparency
0.description: Every game is provably fair and open on the blockchain.

1.title: Security
1.description: Wallet-based login with Dynamic.xyz ‚Äî no passwords, no KYC, total privacy.

2.title: Control
2.description: You decide when to play or take a break.

3.title: Awareness
3.description: We show you how to keep your gaming healthy.

4.title: Support
4.description: Our team's here 24/7 to help with self-exclusion or advice.

playSmart.title: Don't Forget: Play Smart, Play Safe
playSmart.intro: {siteName} is about fun and freedom, never about pressure or financial stress. Stick to these basics:

reminders.0: Set your limits ahead of time.
reminders.1: Walk away when it stops being fun.
reminders.3: Keep gambling separate from your regular finances.
reminders.4: Treat any winnings as a bonus, not a paycheck.

finalMessage.paragraph1: Your well-being comes first. If gaming ever starts to feel like a problem, reach out. We're always here at {siteDomain}.

faqs.title: FAQs ‚Äì {siteName}
faqs.subtitle: Find answers to common {siteName} questions. Learn about wallet login, deposits, withdrawals, fair play, and blockchain transparency.
faqs.intro: Hey, welcome to the {siteName} FAQ. If you're curious about how our crypto gaming platform works, you're in the right spot. Whether you're new to blockchain gaming or you've been around the block a few times, you'll find answers here to help you play smart and safe.|And if you don't see your question, just reach out ‚Äî our support team's always on at {siteDomain}.

blockchainTransparency.title: üß© Blockchain Transparency
blockchainTransparency.paragraph1: {siteName} runs completely on blockchain smart contracts.|Every bet, win, and payout is out in the open‚Äîanyone can check the records.
blockchainTransparency.paragraph2: Want to see for yourself? All {siteName} transactions are on:
blockchainTransparency.guarantee: This way, you know everything's fair and above board.

0.question: Can I register on {siteName}?
0.answer: If you're 18 or older (or old enough to gamble where you live), you can play on {siteName}. Before you jump in, make sure crypto gaming's actually legal where you live.|Signing up is easy. No forms, no passwords, no email hassle. Just connect your crypto wallet through Dynamic.xyz and you're in.|Want to know more about who's eligible? Take a look at our Terms & Conditions.
0.reminder: One quick reminder: gambling can get addictive. Please, play responsibly and know your limits.

1.question: What if I lose access to my account?
1.answer: We use wallet-based login. So, no usernames, no passwords to recover. To get back in, just reconnect with the same wallet address you used before.|Lost access to your wallet? Use your seed phrase or recovery file to restore it.|For your security, we never store private keys and can't recover lost wallets for you.

2.question: Can I change my wallet or username?
2.answer: Your account is tied directly to your wallet. If you want to use a new wallet, connect a different one. Just keep in mind ‚Äî your balance, VIP status, and rewards stay with your old wallet. They don't move over automatically.

3.question: How do I become a VIP member?
3.answer: Our VIP Club is invite-only. As you play and get more involved, we track your activity. Once you qualify, we'll send you a personal invite right on the platform.|VIP perks include:|Higher rewards|Faster withdrawals|Personalized bonuses

0.question: How do I deposit crypto?
0.answer: Depositing is quick and secure, and it all happens on-chain. Here's how:|Open My Wallet on your dashboard.|Hit Deposit and pick your coin (BTC, ETH, USDT, BNB, etc.).|Copy the address or scan the QR code.|Send your crypto from your personal wallet.|Once your transaction gets enough confirmations on the blockchain, your funds show up automatically.
0.reminder: Double-check you're using the right network (ERC20, TRC20, BEP20, etc.) before sending anything.

1.question: How long do deposits take?
1.answer: Usually, deposits show up in 5 to 10 minutes, depending on network traffic and fees. You can keep an eye on your transaction using a blockchain explorer like Etherscan.io or BscScan.com.|We credit your funds after three confirmations.

2.question: What's the minimum withdrawal limit?
2.answer: Each crypto has its own minimum withdrawal amount. You'll see the exact numbers under the Withdraw section. It depends on the coin and the network fee.

3.question: How do I withdraw winnings?
3.answer: To withdraw:|Go to My Wallet and tap Withdraw.|Enter where you want your crypto sent and how much you want to take out.|Double-check the address and network.|Confirm your transaction.|Withdrawals are instant once confirmed on-chain. You'll see your funds in a few minutes.
3.reminder: Always use a wallet that supports the network you're withdrawing from.

4.question: What if my transaction is delayed?
4.answer: If your transaction's taking longer than usual:|Check your TXID with a blockchain explorer.|Make sure you used the right address and network.|Give it a few more minutes for confirmations.|Still waiting after an hour? Contact us at {siteDomain}. Send your TXID and wallet info, and we'll help you sort it out.

0.question: Are {siteName} games fair?
0.answer: Absolutely. Every game is 100% provably fair. We use cryptographic algorithms on the blockchain so you can check every bet and payout yourself.|There are no hidden results, no tricks, just fair and transparent gaming.

1.question: What should I do if a game freezes or crashes?
1.answer: If a game stops working:|Refresh the page.|Clear your browser cache or cookies.|Reconnect your wallet.|Still stuck? Hop on Live Chat. Our team will get your session or balance restored if anything's affected.

2.question: Can I use multiple wallets or accounts?
2.answer: No. One wallet equals one account. Opening extra wallets to grab bonuses or mess with the system breaks our Terms and could cost you your winnings.

3.question: Is my data safe?
3.answer: Yes. We're a wallet-only platform, so we never collect your personal info, emails, passwords, or ID documents.|Your wallet is your identity, and you're in control. No stored user data means you don't have to worry about data breaches.

0.question: Does {siteName} support responsible gaming?
0.answer: Absolutely. Keeping play responsible is at the heart of what we do.|We've built in self-exclusion and cooling-off tools so you can take a break or set limits whenever you need.|If you want advice or just someone to talk to, check out our Responsible Gambling page or drop a note to our support team.

1.question: What should I do if I suspect a gambling problem?
1.answer: If gambling starts messing with your money, health, or relationships, don't wait‚Äîreach out for help. These organizations offer confidential support:|GamCare: https://www.gamcare.org.uk|Gambling Therapy: https://www.gamblingtherapy.org|Gamblers Anonymous: https://www.gamblersanonymous.org|You can always ask {siteName} support to block or pause your account, too.

needMoreHelp.title: üí¨ Need More Help?
needMoreHelp.intro: Our support team's around 24/7.|You can reach us on Live Chat (just log in to your dashboard) or email us at support@{siteDomain}.
needMoreHelp.liveChat: We're here to make sure your experience stays safe, fair, and hassle-free.
